data.title: Company Profile｜Manufacture and Sale of Turnouts｜Kanto Bunkiki｜Yamanaka Group
data.text:
Kanto Bunkiki is striving to flexibly meet the accelerating development of railways and need for high-speed transport these days,

while exploring new possibilities in the field of turnouts.

We will apply the technologies we have acquired to connect cities, people and information with greater speed and comfort, and make it possible to meet and interact with various people in many ways.

Kanto Bunkiki will continue to use its products and services to open up a new era in turnouts.
